title: Marinated mozzarella and prosciutto bites
ingredients: ['100ml olive oil', '1 large garlic clove, crushed', '1/2 red or green pepper, minced', '1 pinch chilli powder', 'salt and pepper to taste', '30 to 40 small mozzarella cheese balls', '10 to 15 slices prosciutto di Parma, cut in half lengthways', '1 bunch fresh basil']
